title: Best of the Program | 6/20/22
description:
Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the latest horrible advice to avoid catching monkeypox and the ongoing predator behavior coming from Disney. Glenn recalls a quote from Michelle Obama from 2008 and how much it has come true. Glenn discusses a WEF adviser whom the left adores, Yuval Noah Harari, who has terrifying views on the future of humanity. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
